name: Tesco Beef Mince 20% Fat 500G
description: Tesco puts quality first when it comes to its fresh meat and ensures that the
farms supplying our approved factories are farm assured and meet the high
standards of the Tesco Livestock Code of Practice. Typically less than 20% fat.
Rich and full of flavour. Versatile for cooking. □ For UK Market Only
